product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Performer Wahine Stand Up Paddleboard - Women's - 10' 6"
long_description: Designed for women, this performance paddleboard combines superior flatwater glide with serious wave performance. It's quite possibly the only board you'll ever need.
